author: smuzaffar
body: Thsi fixes the `DQMOfflineConfiguration` unit tests. Unit tests was failing as `TestDQMOfflineConfigurationGotAll` was suppose to not run any sequence but as now there are over 300 sequences so this tests was running the extra 3 sequences and `grep 'Analyzing 0 seqs'` was failed. I have updated to test to properly report the error.
title: Fix DQMOfflineConfiguration unit tests
